name: Avoid using deprecated objects
description:
List all Deprecated Methods or Fields.
In Java, Deprecated objects are defined with the JavaDoc tag @deprecated or the annotation @deprecated available since JSE 5. (to obtain accurate results, the java archive rt.jar must also have been analyzed).
In VC++ it reports objects using the deprecated __declspec declaration or pragma.
In GCC it reports objects with the deprecated attribute

If the reason/remediation of the deprecation is described in the source code, it is also displayed.
output:
This report lists all the Methods using a deprecated Method
It provides the following information:
 - Method full name
 - deprecated Object full name
If the reason/remediation of the deprecation is described in the source code, it is also displayed.
rationale: Deprecated Methods or Fields may not be available in the next version.
alternativeName: Ensure to not use the deprecated objects

qualityStandards.name: Use of Obsolete Function
qualityStandards.description: The code uses deprecated or obsolete functions, which suggests that the code has not been actively reviewed or maintained.
